price: 26. Ee yeelay la jirka Alle, ilaah kale, ee ku tuura cadaab daran.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِيَاهُ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fa-alqiyāhu fī al-ʿadhābi al-shadīdi
